Pelawaan dari kenalan rakannya untuk memperisterikan Wok, adalah satu berita yang sangat menggembirakan. Deris akad nikah dengan Wok dan segera dibawa pulang ke rumahnya di kota walaupun Wok seolah takut dan tidak mahu berenggang dengan Maimon dia akur kerana itu yang diminta oleh Maimon. Sekaki melangkah ke rumah Deris, Wok diheret kejam ke dalam bilik tanpa sempat menanggalkan tudungnya. Dikerjakan secukupnya itulah tanda malam pertama. Diperkosa dengan rakus oleh suami sendiri. Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Rock 4:Rockers Never Die
programme.desc: Band rock baharu RIMBA BARA 2 memulakan perjalanan untuk menghidupkan semula legasi RIMBA BARA dengan bantuan pengurus mereka, Dio (bekas roadie RIMBA BARA).

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Berasal dari Bandung, Reyhan pergi ke kawasan konflik di Timur Tengah untuk kerja sukarela. Di sana, dia membantu seorang wanita Malaysia bernama Dewi dan jatuh cinta padanya. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Mariam dilahirkan bisu dan lembam. Satu satunya anak tunggal Maimon dan arwah Wak Jahid. Hidup dalam serba serbi kekurangan. Mengutip plastik kaca dan besi untuk imbuhan. Sini sana ada yang memberi bantuan. Mereka hidup bahagia berduaan. Kepala ikan bilis menjadi makanan kesukaan. Keadaan kesihatan Maimon semakin merosot. Maimon berhasrat untuk mencarikan calon buat Wok. Yakin dengan adanya lelaki yang sudi memperisterikan anaknya yang hodoh dan bodoh segalanya tentu tidak merisaukan dia andai mata sudah terpejam selamanya. Pelawaan dari kenalan rakannya untuk memperisterikan Wok, adalah satu berita yang sangat menggembirakan. Deris akad nikah dengan Wok dan segera dibawa pulang ke rumahnya di kota walaupun Wok seolah takut dan tidak mahu berenggang dengan Maimon dia akur kerana itu yang diminta oleh Maimon. Sekaki melangkah ke rumah Deris, Wok diheret kejam ke dalam bilik tanpa sempat menanggalkan tudungnya. Dikerjakan secukupnya itulah tanda malam pertama. Diperkosa dengan rakus oleh suami sendiri. Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Bini-biniku Gangster
programme.desc: Manja dan Herry adalah sepasang suami isteri yang sangat romantik dan saling sayang menyayangi. Tanpa disedari oleh Herry, Manja adalah ketua kumpulan kepada sebuah geng gengster di Kuala Lumpur. Di pejabat,Herry kerap dibuli Mat Saja termasuk menyuruh Herry menggantikan tempatnya semasa ulangtahun perkahwinan Manja dan Herry yang ke2. Manja bengang lalu menghantar orang-orangnya memukul Mat Saja.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yatim piatu yang dijaga oleh ibu saudaranya. Sebaliknya, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua insan yang berbeza ini bertemu secara kebetulan dan akhirnya menjalin hubungan. Kini, dalam "Adnan Sempit 2", Shaheizy Sam kembali memegang watak sebagai Adnan, mengisahkan cabaran dan dugaan dalam kehidupannya serta hubungannya dengan Nadia.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 3
programme.desc: NADIA dan WAWA disahkan mengandung! ADNAN gembira kerana akhirnya dia bakal menjadi seorang bapa. Dia bersedia untuk menjaga NADIA, tetapi sebaliknya, dia yang mengalami alahan pagi dan pelbagai gejala kehamilan. Sementara itu, WAWA dan BOBBY menjalani kehidupan yang sederhana dan menghadapi masalah kewangan. WAWA mula marah kepada BOBBY kerana mereka tidak mempunyai cukup wang semasa tempoh kehamilannya dan menjelang kelahiran. Sebagai seorang kawan yang baik, ADNAN meminjamkan wang kepada BOBBY. Namun, BOBBY tidak lagi berani meminta wang daripada ADNAN selepas dimarahi olehnya yang tertekan dengan keadaan NADIA. Akibat desakan hidup, BOBBY membuat keputusan untuk berlumba semula.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Generasi GIG
programme.desc: Selepas menyelamatkan Nadia (Afifah Nasir), seorang wanita moden yang telah lama diminatinya, Adnan (Aiman Tino), seorang penghantar makanan, mula jatuh cinta tanpa menyedari bahawa dia mungkin terperangkap dalam rancangan tersembunyi wanita tersebut.

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil
programme.desc: Abang Long Fadil, seorang lelaki yang sentiasa berangan bahawa kehidupannya seperti seorang gangster. Tetapi apabila sahabat baiknya, Malik dimasukkan ke penjara, lebih banyak kekacauan berlaku dan angan-angannya mungkin tidak jauh berbeza daripada realiti.

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 2
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Fadil yang terjerumus ke dalam dunia mafia yang diketuai oleh Taji Samprit dan anaknya, Wak Doyok. Satu insiden menyebabkan Inspektor Wahab dan Inspektor Shuib mengesyaki Fadil sebagai Tiger, seorang pembunuh upahan profesional.

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep10
programme.desc: Mengungkap kisah-kisah menyentuh hati di sekeliling kita, tentang mereka yang kehilangan insan tersayang. Mampukah mereka kembali dalam kehangatan keluarga?

programme.title: The Sultan Empire Ep4
programme.desc: The Sultan Empire merupakan bentuk baharu Sultan, iaitu sebuah rancangan komedi sketsa bertemakan kerajaan yang dipenuhi dengan bintang jemputan.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep14
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Biar Kaum Mendang Mending Tapi Senyumku Bikin Salting
programme.desc: Mentari terkejut apabila mendapati dia bukan anak kandung Puan Wulan. Tiba-tiba, Senja menuntut haknya sebagai anak kandung Puan Wulan malah merampas tunang Mentari, iaitu Daniel. Mentari pergi ke rumah ibu kandungnya. Pada awalnya, ibu kandung Mentari tidak mahu menerimanya. Namun, Mentari diberi izin untuk tinggal selagi dia sanggup menjalani kehidupan yang sukar dan membantu Galang dalam perniagaan jualan sate.

programme.title: Inbox 2022 Ep3
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep76
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Lampung Geh Ep1
programme.desc: Dokumentari perjalanan yang merakam keunikan Lampung, daripada keindahan alam semula jadi hingga pelbagai aktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep226
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Tukang Cukur Keliling Yang Selalu Mendapat Ujian Saat Hendak Mewujudkan Mimpinya Membangun Mushola
programme.desc: Mengikut pesanan terakhir dari isterinya yang telah meninggal, Encik Amin menyusul anak lelakinya, Fajar, yang tinggal di bandar. Di bandar, Fajar tinggal bersama isterinya, Lilis, dan anak lelakinya, Rangga. Fajar juga sering bertengkar dengan isterinya tentang perniagaan gunting rambutnya yang tidak berjalan lancar.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Musikal Cinta 24 Karat Ep1
programme.desc: Meraikan ulang tahun ke-24, Indosiar mempersembahkan persembahan luar biasa. Menggabungkan drama muzikal dan muzik dangdut, acara ini bakal dimeriahkan oleh penyanyi terkemuka.

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep39
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep2
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Siapa Musuh Dalam Selimut Dalam Keluargaku
programme.desc: Di mata keluarganya, Hengki kelihatan sebagai suami yang romantis dan setia. Malah, dia mendapat kepercayaan untuk mengurus perniagaan milik isteri dan mertuanya. Namun di belakang Raisa, Hengki bermain kayu tiga dan sering mengambil duit dari kedai.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep62
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep3
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep228
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Wanita Penuh Ambisi Yang Hancur Oleh Kesombongannya Sendiri
programme.desc: Mira bertekad untuk mengahwini lelaki kaya dan menikmati harta kekayaannya. Namun, Yanuar yang ingin melamarnya terpaksa mengundurkan diri setelah melihat betapa tamaknya Mira. Tidak dapat menerima penolakan itu, Mira berjanji akan membalas dendam terhadap Yanuar.

programme.title: Konser Raya 24 Luar Biasa Ep1
programme.desc: Indosiar menyambut ulang tahun ke-24 dengan sebuah acara gilang-gemilang yang menampilkan persembahan luar biasa daripada selebriti terkenal. Nikmati gabungan muzik, hiburan, dan detik istimewa yang pasti memukau para penonton.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: 4Pm
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: The Roundup: Punishment
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Beautiful Audrey
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-Ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex -- until they run into each other.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Deadman

programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Rampant

Under their supervision, the youths faced challenges in three stages: the initial stage, collaboration stage, and final performance stage. They combined dynamic music and passionate dance to showcase the fusion of traditional Chinese culture with street dance culture.

programme.title: Super Mom Ep12
programme.desc: Host Jiang Mengjie returns to the Jiangnan and Yangzhou to run her "Warm Inn" away from the city's hustle. Each episode invites a celebrity guest and friends for an immersive experience of local culture, unlocking the region's charm and embarking on a warm and healing journey together.

programme.title: Whisperâ€™s dishes Season 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Lets share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 6 Ep9
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Celebrities are invited to join and reveal their experience and love stories in Season Six to help the guests to find true love. The show aims to interpret youngsters views on marriage and love through discussion among different generation.

programme.title: Wei Jie Xiang Chou Ep3
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: Artes Sino-LusÃ³fonas Season 2 Ep2
programme.desc: This story explores the emotional connection between people and their hometown food. Through interviews with locals and those abroad, it highlights how food symbolizes their roots and showcases the rich history and authentic flavors of Jiangsu cuisine.

programme.title: The Melody of You Season 2 (Live) Ep2
programme.desc: Explore Portuguese-speaking countries' traditions, learn historical stories, and enjoy music, dance, handicrafts, and films. Showcasing cultural fusion, highlighting uniqueness, and appreciating diverse ethnic cultures in China and Portuguese-speaking countries.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep21
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2324
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep4007
programme.desc: <Stylish Man - The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man - The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep3130
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep27
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep22
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man - The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep270
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man - The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep27
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: 2025 Pingtung Spring Music Festival (M) 2025 Ep1
programme.desc: The Pingtung Spring Music Festival is an annual celebration held every April in Pingtung, Taiwan. Spring symbolizes renewal, while Great Day in Taiwanese signifies a time for joy and festivity. In 2025, the festival returns from April 11 with three electrifying nights of non-stop music! From timeless classics to high-energy rock and indie vibes, theres something for everyone. Dont miss Pingtungs biggest music party of the year, three days of pure excitement and unforgettable performances! 4 2025 4 11

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2005
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4736
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in 1960s and 70s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, in Hong Kong, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gangsters again in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: The next installment in the Mission Impossible franchise. Super-spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) has retired from active duty to train new IMF agents. But he is called back into action to confront the toughest villain he's ever faced - Owen Davian (Philip Seymour Hoffman), an international weapons and information provider with no remorse and no conscience. Hunt assembles his team - his old friend Luther Strickell (Ving Rhames), transportation expert Declan (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), background operative Zhen (Maggie Q), and fresh recruit Lindsey (Keri Russell) - to travel the globe pursuing Davian and rescue Hunt's love, Julia (Michelle Monaghan).

programme.desc: In Health and in Sickness - Confident that he has finally won over Agnese, Andrea tries to organize a wedding in the ward for a patient in critical condition. Gabriel makes an unexpected proposal that upsets the balance within the group of interns.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands Ep10
programme.desc: What We Are - A patient sheds light on a secret about Lorenzo's private life that causes a stir throughout the ward. Gabriel and Elisa must attempt to reconstruct the life of an elderly inpatient who appears not to remember anything about himself.

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep1
programme.desc: You Cant Always Trust What You See - Will Halstead returns to Med to help Goodwin with a secret investigation. Archer and Charles deal with twins who insist on being identical inside and out.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep2
programme.desc: To Lean In, Or To Let Go - Vanessa and Archer disagree on how to handle the victim of a motorcycle accident. Dylan and Charles deal with a UNICEF negotiator with repressed trauma.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep3
programme.desc: Be The Change You Want To See - Dylan and Will deal with a dishonest patient whose lupus is in remission. A wealthy donor makes inappropriate advances toward Stevie.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Status Quo, AKA The Mess We're In - Charles helps Dylan with a longtime patient who was recently diagnosed with schizophrenia. Stevie, Maggie and Vanessa investigate the legitimacy of a patients cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Change Is A Tough Pill To Swallow - Dylan and Charles treat patients suffering from Glass Child Syndrome and misdiagnosed ADHD.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep6
programme.desc: When You're A Hammer Everything's A Nail - Stevies personal and professional worlds collide when her mother becomes her patient.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Curvature
programme.desc: A scientist must break into a top-secret facility in order to travel back in time and prevent a murder after receiving a mysterious phone call from herself.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return to the Wild - The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Grass is Greener - Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Clash of the Alphas - Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoors poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Human Influenced - In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet weve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep2

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Estis leg infection puts the brakes on this young duikers release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mate-attracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs traffic-dodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Superpowers - Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs prey-detecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Woodland Troop - In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep7
programme.desc: Worst In Show - The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction - When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Zippleback Down - While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep3
programme.desc: Garage - The Dinotrux builds a garage where the Reptools can be safe, but D-Structs tries to thwart their efforts by pitting them against one another.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep4
programme.desc: Crabby / Spe-shell - When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When the towns well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday / Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruzs help to perform a dance for Moms birthday. Though its hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - Its Pawstons annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and its Tags year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sams behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into mans best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, its up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Marias painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep4
programme.desc: Crabby / Spe-shell - When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: View To A Skrill (Part 1) - Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.desc: Live and let Fly - Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups and a Whale of a Tale - The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale thats trapped under the ice.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase.
