programme.desc: Simple ideas for how to make a difference - Women drive climate action in The Gambia. Plus: How mushroom farming could be key to a better future, while retired chickens boost olive harvests!

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Saving Our Soil - Farming with a Future - For a long time, soil was all but ignored. But for years, the valuable humus layer has been thinning. Farmers in Brandenburg are clearly feeling the effects of this on their sandy fields. Many are now taking steps to prepare their farms for the future.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: News in Review

programme.title: Made in Germany
programme.desc: Batteries without China, cows without farmers - Europes battery industry is aiming to reduce its dependence on China. Germany is investing in green hydrogen. Farmers are managing livestock via smartphone. And Trumps immigration policies are reshaping the US labor market.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: ENTR
programme.desc: Lithuanias youth is the happiest in Europe - but WHY?! - Lithuania topped the World Happiness Report in 2024 in #happiness of people below the age of 30. At the same time, Lithuania has one of the highest numbers of low wage workers in the EU, and more than 300 000 people emigrated from the country in the last 10 years. So, is #Lithuania really the best place for young people?

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: The bitter truth about sugar - Many people eat way more sugar than doctors advise. That can lead to fatty liver or diabetes. Why are we so hooked on sweet stuff? How can you find the hidden sugar in shop-bought products? In Good Shape on the world's favorite drug.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Close up
programme.desc: Cartels in Ecuador - Democracy under Pressure - Long one of the safest countries in South America, Ecuador is at risk of becoming a narco-state. 1,300 people were murdered in the first 50 days of 2025. This film follows victims families, documenting their strength as they fight for democracy.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Eco India
programme.desc: Pollution from sunken warships & cow dung to the rescue, Eco India - From oil leaks from shipwrecks to coastal erosion in Chennai - our planet is under pressure. But hope comes from unexpected places, like cow dung-powered energy and sustainable fish subscriptions, proving that innovation can turn crisis into opportunity.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: The Forests of Papua New Guinea - The Time for Solutions - Mundiya Kepanga's fight against deforestation has paid off. The leader of the Huli tribe in the forests of Papua New Guinea is delighted that the government wants to make the country a global role model for sustainable forest management.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Breaking the Status Quo - Three people, living three unusual lives, in three Eastern European countries. This films protagonists are united by the challenges, suffering and constant change they face - as well as by their confidence that things will turn out well in the end.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: Negative energy prices: Why cheap electricity can create huge problems - The last three years have seen a rapid increase in renewable energy production across much of Europe. But thanks to the variability of solar and wind energy, sometimes more energy is being produced than can actually be used, which tips prices not only into ultra cheap territory, but sometimes into the negatives. Why's this happening?

The leader of the Huli tribe in the forests of Papua New Guinea is delighted that the government wants to make the country a global role model for sustainable forest management.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: Negative energy prices: Why cheap electricity can create huge problems - The last three years have seen a rapid increase in renewable energy production across much of Europe. But thanks to the variability of solar and wind energy, sometimes more energy is being produced than can actually be used, which tips prices not only into ultra cheap territory, but sometimes into the negatives. Why's this happening?

programme.title: Close up
programme.desc: Cartels in Ecuador - Democracy under Pressure - Long one of the safest countries in South America, Ecuador is at risk of becoming a narco-state. 1,300 people were murdered in the first 50 days of 2025. This film follows victims families, documenting their strength as they fight for democracy.

programme.desc: Pandemic? No Thanks! - Recognizing New Diseases Early - Corona, AIDS and the Spanish flu have claimed many millions of lives. Now, researchers around the world are trying to better predict and prevent pandemics like these in the future.

programme.title: In Good Shape

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: The Magazine for Africa's Youth - This week, we explore why Afro-descendants from the Americas and beyond, are choosing to leave their lives in the West to return to their ancestral Africa. We meet a single mother who traded life in Canada for a fresh start in Kenya and a filmmaker who returned to her roots in Sierra Leone. In Ghana, we hear from some of the over 1,000 African Americans now calling it home.

programme.desc: Photographer Abe Satoru visits a workshop in Yamagata that makes kendama, a Japanese toy, and takes a look at the artisans' bentos. We also visit the late singer-songwriter KAN's favorite lunch spot.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Miwa Kaito uses information and communications technology to help children in poverty around the world who lack access to adequate schooling. He shares his vision for providing educational support.

programme.title: Nun'S Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the spring dates of seimei and kokuu. The temple chefs show us how to make two seasonal specialties, yomogi rice cakes and bamboo shoots mixed with sansho leaves.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life(5)
programme.desc: Mornings begin early for fishmongers and vegetable peddlers at Nihonbashi Bridge, and here is a reason. They are not going to bow to the lord's procession. The bustling scene from everyday Edo life.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: After a lifetime's work, dairy farmer Yoshikawa Yuji was diagnosed with cancer and had to retire. As his son takes over the farm, what joys and struggles does he encounter?

programme.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Found all over Japan, torii are gateways to Shinto shrines and the deities within. We meet people trying to rebuild torii after a huge earthquake and examine what torii mean to Japanese people.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep711
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Loma Lookboonme, Front Row: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Michael Page, Day One: Jailton Almeida - Loma Lookboonme details her story from Muay Thai fights in rural Thailand to making history as the first Thai fighter in the UFC. We join interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall Front Row at Madison Square Garden for Jon Jones versus Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. Welterweight striker Michael Venom Page gives us his top 5 favorite heavy hitters in the UFC. Jailton Almeida walks us through his UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep21
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 ranked featherweights Josh Emmett and Lerone Murphy clash on April 5th in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the biggest punchers in the sport, Emmett makes his first start since his knockout of Bryce Mitchell in December of 2023 to face off with Manchester, Englands Lerone Murphy, an unbeaten rising star who is coming off back-to-back wins over Edson Barboza and Dan Ige.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Moreno vs. Erceg
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Mexico City on March 30, and the UFC Fight Night event at Arena CDMX will feature the first Mexican to win a UFC title, as Brandon Moreno faces off with Australian contender Steve Erceg in a matchup expected to shake up the flyweight rankings. Looking to be crowned king for a third time, Moreno will be hungry to deliver a victory to his fans, while Erceg attempts to score the biggest win of his career on the road.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Moreno vs. Erceg

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep21
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep711
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Loma Lookboonme, Front Row: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Michael Page, Day One: Jailton Almeida - Loma Lookboonme details her story from Muay Thai fights in rural Thailand to making history as the first Thai fighter in the UFC. We join interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall Front Row at Madison Square Garden for Jon Jones versus Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. Welterweight striker Michael Venom Page gives us his top 5 favorite heavy hitters in the UFC. Jailton Almeida walks us through his UFC debut in Day One.
